job.title: Senior Software Engineer - TrainHeroic
job.description: Are you ready to work on a product impacting millions of people TrainHeroics user base of athletes and coaches is growing rapidly We call them Heroes To meet their demands TrainHeroic needs innovators collaborators and excellent engineers like you Together were building the worlds best training app Join TrainHeroic today DaytoDaybrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliBuild fullstack solutions to grow our platform to millions of athletes and coachesliliAnalyze customer data and develop hypotheses around growth opportunitiesliliDevelop experiments and tracking for growthoriented features across our web and mobile appsliliThrive in an iterative and collaborative engineering environment Our engineers push code to production every day averaging 250 releases per engineer per yearliliImprove code quality through automated testing refactoring and code reviews What Some of Our Projects Look LikeliliOptimizing user flows and conversion funnels for athletes in our MarketplaceliliWriting investigative SQL queries and data visualizations to identify and understand patterns in athlete and coach behaviorsliliDeveloping creative fullstack features across our mobile app and API to increase athlete enjoyment and satisfactionliliBuilding reporting and data analysis solutions that empower coaches to grow their online training businessliulstrongRequirementsbrstrongulliExperience 4 years of software engineering experienceliliFrontend Technical Skills JavaScript CSS and a framework like React Vue or Angular In this role you will work directly on our React web app and React Native mobile appliliBackend SQL and PHP Ruby Python or a similar language The work characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential to apply online Work Environment This job operates in a professional office environment that is welllighted heated andor airconditioned with adequate ventilation and a noise level that is usually moderate This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers phones photocopiers and filing cabinets All employees must comply with all safety policies practices and procedures Report all unsafe activities to your manager andor Human Resources Physical Demands While performing the duties of this job the employee is regularly required to sit and move about the facility use hands to handle or feel talk by expressing ideas by means of the spoken word and hear by perceiving the nature of sounds The employee is occasionally required to stand walk and reach with hands and arms The employee must occasionally lift andor move up to 10 pounds Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision distance vision color vision peripheral vision depth perception and
